name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2008
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2008年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This primary aluminum ingot casting process is used for producing high-purity aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. These ingots are typically utilized in a variety of industries such as automotive, construction, and packaging, where they are further processed into components, structures, or packaging materials.
此原生铝锭铸造过程用于从液态原生铝生产高纯度铝锭。这些铝锭通常用于汽车、建筑和包装等行业，进一步加工成组件、结构或包装材料。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This primary aluminum ingot casting process is used for producing high-purity aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. These ingots are typically utilized in a variety of industries such as automotive, construction, and packaging, where they are further processed into components, structures, or packaging materials.
此原生铝锭铸造过程用于从液态原生铝生产高纯度铝锭。这些铝锭通常用于汽车、建筑和包装等行业，进一步加工成组件、结构或包装材料。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) data for this primary aluminum ingot casting process should be used with caution. Ensure that the scope of the LCA encompasses the entire lifecycle of the product, from raw material extraction through the end-of-life phase. It is paramount to consider the year of publication for data relevance and to rely on updated statistical data sources and literatures for process analysis. Background data is sourced from the CAS RCEES 2018 database; verify that this aligns with the geographical context of the assessment. Be aware of the methodological differences and ensure data consistency when integrating with other datasets.
本原生铝锭铸造过程的生命周期评估（LCA）数据应谨慎使用。确保LCA范围包含产品的整个生命周期，从原材料提取到生命周期结束阶段。考虑出版年份对数据相关性至关重要，并依赖于更新的统计数据来源和文献进行过程分析。背景数据来源于CAS RCEES 2018数据库；验证这是否与评估的地理背景一致。注意方法论差异，并在与其他数据集整合时确保数据一致性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
